notes_text: If one possesses large amounts, a jail sentence of anywhere from 3 months to 5 years may be given. Medicinal cannabis legalized since 2016.
notes: If one possesses large amounts, a jail sentence of anywhere from 3 months to 5 years may be given. Medicinal cannabis legalized since 2016.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in North Macedonia}} If one possesses large amounts, a jail sentence of anywhere from 3 months to 5 years may be given.<ref>{{citation |url = http://www.encod.org/info/MACEDONIA.html |title = European Coalition for Just and Effective Drug Policies |publisher = Encod.org |access-date = 17 February 2011 |url-status = dead |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20110518004610/http://www.encod.org/info/MACEDONIA.html |archive-date = 18 May 2011}}</ref> Medicinal cannabis legalized since 2016.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.balkanews.org/index.php/2016/02/10/macedonia-parliament-legalizes-medical-marijuana/|title=Macedonia: Parliament Legalizes Medical Marijuana|work=Eurasia Review|date=22 April 2015|access-date=5 June 2018|archive-date=12 March 2020|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200312221640/http://www.ezyspot.com/|url-status=dead}}</ref>
